The claim being analyzed is that: Liberal Democrats" who support Dan McCready "cut $716 BILLION from Medicare to fund their healthcare scheme: Obamacare."
The expert: s verdict states that the claim has been running as a Facebook ad paid for by Republican Mark Harris since October 22, 2018.
The expert mentions that the: 716 billion figure has been used by politicians since at least 2012, and provides examples of similar claims made by Mitt Romney, Paul Ryan, and Mike Huckabee, which were rated as Half True or Mostly False by PolitiFact.
The expert also mentions that the: 716 billion figure comes from a Washington Post blog post from 2012, which states that while there was a cut in spending, there was no loss of services or decrease in quality of services for Medicare beneficiaries.
